rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard an interesting story
from Seiryuu-san, but...

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0002
rows.name:
What were we supposed
to do after this again?

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0005
rows.name:
We're staying at an inn in
the Royal Capital to prepare
for the award ceremony.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0008
rows.name:
Becoming a knight of Iira
won't change anything.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0009
rows.name:
That's right.
There's no need to stress about it.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0010
rows.name:
I guess, but it doesn't sound
very convincing coming from
a Prince and an Emperor.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0011
rows.name:
As I mentioned before,
what if you thought about it this way?

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0012
rows.name:
By becoming a knight of Iira,
you've earned the right to wield
Iira's secret treasure.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0013
rows.name:
I'm sure you were worried that Iira
might come after you, but from now on,
you have nothing to worry about.

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0015
rows.name:
Maybe I'll feel a bit better
if I look at it that way...

rows.label: campfev11_610_150_msg0016
rows.name:
Okay! I'm going back to the inn
to get ready for the ceremony!
